infoList.name: Bandits
infoList.info: You were ambushed by forest bandits!

infoList.name: GoldBagFound
infoList.info: You have found a bag of gold!

infoList.name: HealingGnome
infoList.info: You have found a gnome, stuck between heavy logs. You removed these logs, but as you touched him, he suddenly vanished. You feel much better.

infoList.name: Victory
infoList.info: You have discovered the whole forest!
